title: Tactical Gaming is Recruiting Again! Everyone is Welcome to Join!

embed.description: Welcome to Tactical Gaming Register now to join our community of like minded gamers. TG consists of active gamers which have a "real life first" mindset. We aim to satisfy our member's needs for team based gaming by having our Tactical Warfare franchise for warfare based games and our Tactical Sports franchise for sports based games.

body:
Hello Boy and Girls,

We at tactical gaming want you!

Tactical Gaming is all about fellowship, maturity and likeminded gaming. No matter what rank or level you are, there's always people there to play with you. I myself have been in tactical gaming for quite a while now and have not regretted it since. I've found many good friends there, which I play with nearly everyday. While we always strife for a good teamspirit, we never forgot the most important thing, which is having fun!

Of course, for those of you out there who are out for blood and hardcore into the competitive scene, there's also a spot for you guys! We have several Teams in both EU, and NA that are hardcore competitive and get the support they need! 

And even if you are just looking for people to play with and don't really mind what you play, or wether you're new to league and are looking for people to play with you while you level and are willing to help you learn the game, Tactical Gaming offers all of that!

What ever your playstyle mayb be, we're always looking forward for you guys to join. So don't be scared and hop onto the train with us!

Just click the following link to join us! [Tactical Gaming](http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/index.php?app=referrals&reff=13323)
 
> Head Quarters: http://www.TacticalGaming.net
> 
> >About us: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/news/tactical-gaming-history
> 
> >Why TG?: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/news/about-tactical-gaming
> 
> >If you register, please reply here stating you have done so.

replies.body: Theres only room for one of us
One of us, one of us, one of us, one of us!

Just joined half a month ago and I love it, If you're looking to be with a good group of people and just have fun then TG is for you. On the other side of the coin, if you want to get in a group with committed members with the aspiration to be competitive in ranked then TG is for you too! I debated on joining for a while but finally told myself "well what's the worst that can happen? If I don't like it I can just not do it." I haven't turned back since, If you're on the border about joining or want to see what it's about you might as well just sign up! Friend me when you joing, Sapper1775
Don't forget to check out TG! :)
Have registered, looking to join an OCE team.{{champion:103}}
I've Registered! Diamond AD lf a decent team environment

I have been in Tactical Gaming for over a year now and have loved all the time I have spent there. I highly recommend checking us out. We are open to all types of gamers, whether you play casually or want to be more competitive.
i will register if theres a spot left in the OCE team. If not i wont waste my time.
We're actually rebuilding out OCE side. We have teams for oce already but need more :D
